short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that shows barcodes for EAN codes on Praxis.nl

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension replaces the EAN codes on praxis.nl with scannable barcodes.

~- Version 1.2.0 -~
- Updated extension to work with product page changes.

~- Version 1.1.0 -~
- It is now easier to copy the EAN code.
